post.body: That's the toughest part of getting started on Twitter. The box says "What are you doing?" So, we answer that question.
I'd love to know what the "Disruptive Technology Office" does.
After reading The Unthinkable, will have more trust in the public & let them know how they can take an active role in response
Qik on the iPhone will change the nature of citizen reporting in a disaster. Imagine Mumbai with live streaming video.
NJ gas stations are the worst, sorry, bud.
how would non-Kindle users figure this out?
Congrats, Grandpop!
While I appreciate the work he's done on envr issues, his vaccine rants scare me. I worry about his dep on non-sci issues.
Congrats on the win!
I saw that Supervolcano movie on Discovery, and I have to admit, I'm a bit spooked by the Yellowstone earthquakes this week.
I'm reading a NEJM article on neuraminidase inhibitors 4 flu from '05. In just three years it has be rewritten 'cuz of AV resistance in flu.
Just got out of HHS panflu conference call. Very interesting stuff.
I just joined the emergency-manage Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/emergency-manage and you can too. Please Retweet.
Snow in Philly in November? What is this--the 70's?
There's got to be a better way to organize a shared drive. Every one I've ever seen is a horrible mess. For productivity's sake!
#eagles Woohoo!
#eagles Wonderful, Westbrook's hurt now.
Ugh, phila city cuts hit libraries, Rec Dept, Fire Dept, Police, Health, emergency management, just about everyThing. Hopefully, well be ok.
Nice little article about my building in today's Daily News.
In true Philadelphia fatalism, it rains the week after the Phillies and Obama win. Just can't leave a good thing alone.
